attributes.action: 2021 GCSEs and A levels should be made easier or cancelled
attributes.additional_details: The government need to make exams suited to children and making them based on the topic they have learnt already it would better for them due to being able to get better grades due to not being at school or if not they should be cancelled and student should be given predicted grades because Teachers are trained professionals. You defer to medical experts in a time of crisis. You also need to defer to your educational experts during this same time. So please act as I am one one many Year 10 students out there
attributes.background: Y10 students are also panicking not being in the school environment and not learning about new topics and it is fair to say schools are giving task to do but you cannot learn the same amount at home then at school therefore Y10 exams should be based on only the topics that they have studied already

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a very similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/312570.
